verses.verse: <S%H2977>Josiah<s%> was <S%H8083>eight<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> when he began to <S%H4427>reign;<s%> and he <S%H4427>reigned<s%> <S%H7970>thirty<s%> - <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>

He <S%H6213>did<s%> that which was <S%H3477>right<s%> in the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and <S%H3212>walked<s%> in the <S%H1870>ways<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%> his <S%H1>father,<s%> and <S%H5493>didn't<s%> turn aside to the right <S%H3225>hand<s%> or to the <S%H8040>left.<s%>

For in the <S%H8083>eighth<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of his <S%H4427>reign,<s%> while he was yet <S%H5288>young,<s%> he <S%H2490>began<s%> to <S%H1875>seek<s%> after the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%> his <S%H1>father;<s%> and in the <S%H8147>twelfth<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> he <S%H2490>began<s%> to <S%H2891>purge<s%> <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> from the high <S%H1116>places,<s%> and the <S%H842>Asherim,<s%> and the engraved <S%H6456>images,<s%> and the molten <S%H4541>images.<s%>

They broke <S%H5422>down<s%> the <S%H4196>altars<s%> of the <S%H1168>Baals<s%> in his <S%H6440>presence;<s%> and the incense <S%H2553>altars<s%> that were on high above <S%H4605>them<s%> he cut <S%H1438>down;<s%> and the <S%H842>Asherim,<s%> and the engraved <S%H6456>images,<s%> and the molten <S%H6456>images,<s%> he broke in <S%H7665>pieces,<s%> and made <S%H1854>dust<s%> of <S%H2236>them,<s%> and strewed it <S%H6440>on<s%> the <S%H6913>graves<s%> of those who had sacrificed to <S%H2076>them.<s%>
He <S%H8313>burnt<s%> the <S%H6106>bones<s%> of the <S%H3548>priests<s%> on their <S%H4196>altars,<s%> and <S%H2891>purged<s%> <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>
He did this in the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> and <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> and <S%H8095>Simeon,<s%> even to <S%H5321>Naphtali,<s%> <S%H5439>around<s%> in their <S%H2719>ruins.<s%>

He broke <S%H5422>down<s%> the <S%H4196>altars,<s%> and <S%H3807>beat<s%> the <S%H842>Asherim<s%> and the engraved <S%H6456>images<s%> into <S%H1854>powder,<s%> and cut <S%H1438>down<s%> all the incense <S%H2553>altars<s%> throughout all the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H7725>returned<s%> to <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>

Now in the <S%H8083>eighteenth<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of his <S%H4427>reign,<s%> when he had <S%H2891>purged<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> and the <S%H1004>house,<s%> he <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H8227>Shaphan<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H683>Azaliah,<s%> and <S%H4641>Maaseiah<s%> the <S%H8269>governor<s%> of the <S%H5892>city,<s%> and <S%H3098>Joah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3099>Joahaz<s%> the <S%H2142>recorder,<s%> to <S%H2388>repair<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> his <S%H430>God.<s%>

They <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H2518>Hilkiah<s%> the <S%H1419>high<s%> <S%H3548>priest,<s%> and <S%H5414>delivered<s%> the <S%H3701>money<s%> that was <S%H935>brought<s%> into the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> which the <S%H3881>Levites,<s%> the <S%H8104>keepers<s%> of the <S%H5592>threshold,<s%> had <S%H622>gathered<s%> of the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> and <S%H669>Ephraim,<s%> and of all the <S%H7611>remnant<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and of all <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and <S%H1144>Benjamin,<s%> and of the <S%H7725>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>

They <S%H5414>delivered<s%> it into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H6213>workmen<s%> who had the <S%H6485>oversight<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh;<s%> and the <S%H6213>workmen<s%> who <S%H6213>labored<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> it to <S%H2388>mend<s%> and <S%H918>repair<s%> the <S%H1004>house;<s%>

even to the <S%H2796>carpenters<s%> and to the <S%H1129>builders<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> they <S%H7069>it,<s%> to buy <S%H4274>cut<s%> <S%H68>stone,<s%> and <S%H6086>timber<s%> for <S%H4226>couplings,<s%> and to make <S%H7136>beams<s%> for the <S%H1004>houses<s%> which the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> had <S%H7843>destroyed.<s%>

The <S%H582>men<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> the <S%H4399>work<s%> <S%H530>faithfully:<s%> and their <S%H5329>overseers<s%> were <S%H3189>Jahath<s%> and <S%H5662>Obadiah,<s%> the <S%H3881>Levites,<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H4847>Merari;<s%> and <S%H2148>Zechariah<s%> and <S%H4918>Meshullam,<s%> of the sons of the <S%H6956>Kohathites,<s%> to set it <S%H6485>forward;<s%> and others of the <S%H3881>Levites,<s%> all who were <S%H995>skillful<s%> with <S%H3627>instruments<s%> of <S%H7892>music.<s%>

Also they were over the bearers of <S%H5449>burdens,<s%> and set <S%H5329>forward<s%> all who <S%H6213>did<s%> the <S%H4399>work<s%> in every kind of <S%H5656>service:<s%> and of the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> there were <S%H5608>scribes,<s%> and <S%H7860>officers,<s%> and <S%H7778>porters.<s%>

When they brought <S%H3318>out<s%> the <S%H3701>money<s%> that was brought <S%H935>into<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> <S%H2518>Hilkiah<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H4672>found<s%> the <S%H5612>book<s%> of the <S%H8451>law<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> given <S%H3027>by<s%> <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>

<S%H2518>Hilkiah<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> <S%H8227>Shaphan<s%> <S%H559>the<s%> <S%H5608>scribe,<s%> "I have <S%H4672>found<s%> the <S%H5612>book<s%> of the <S%H8451>law<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>" <S%H2518>Hilkiah<s%> <S%H5414>delivered<s%> the <S%H5612>book<s%> to <S%H8227>Shaphan.<s%>

<S%H8227>Shaphan<s%> <S%H935>carried<s%> the <S%H5612>book<s%> to the <S%H4428>king,<s%> and moreover <S%H7725>brought<s%> <S%H7725>back<s%> <S%H1697>word<s%> to the <S%H4428>king,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "All that was <S%H5414>committed<s%> <S%H3027>to<s%> your <S%H5650>servants,<s%> they are <S%H6213>doing.<s%>

They have <S%H5413>emptied<s%> out the <S%H3701>money<s%> that was <S%H4672>found<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and have <S%H5414>delivered<s%> it into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H6485>overseers,<s%> and into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H6213>workmen.<s%>"

<S%H8227>Shaphan<s%> the <S%H5608>scribe<s%> <S%H5046>told<s%> the <S%H4428>king,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H2518>"Hilkiah<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> has <S%H5414>delivered<s%> me a <S%H5612>book.<s%>" <S%H8227>Shaphan<s%> <S%H7121>read<s%> therein <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H4428>king.<s%>
It <S%H4428>happened,<s%> when the king had <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of the <S%H8451>law,<s%> that he <S%H7167>tore<s%> his <S%H899>clothes.<s%>

The <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H2518>Hilkiah,<s%> and <S%H296>Ahikam<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H8227>Shaphan,<s%> and <S%H5658>Abdon<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4318>Micah,<s%> and <S%H8227>Shaphan<s%> the <S%H5608>scribe,<s%> and <S%H6222>Asaiah<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H5650>servant,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H3212>"Go<s%> <S%H1875>inquire<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> for <S%H7604>me,<s%> and for those who are left in <S%H3478>Israel<s%> and in <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> concerning the <S%H1697>words<s%> of the <S%H5612>book<s%> that is <S%H4672>found;<s%> for <S%H1419>great<s%> is the <S%H2534>wrath<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> that is poured <S%H5413>out<s%> on <S%H1>us,<s%> because our fathers have not <S%H8104>kept<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> according to all that is <S%H3789>written<s%> in this <S%H5612>book.<s%>"

So <S%H2518>Hilkiah,<s%> and they whom the <S%H4428>king<s%> had <S%H3212>commanded,<s%> went to <S%H2468>Huldah<s%> the <S%H5031>prophetess,<s%> the <S%H802>wife<s%> of <S%H7967>Shallum<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H8616>Tokhath,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2641>Hasrah,<s%> <S%H8104>keeper<s%> of the <S%H899>wardrobe;<s%> (now she <S%H3427>lived<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> in the second <S%H4932>quarter;<s%>) and they spoke to her to that <S%H1696>effect.<s%>
She <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H559>them,<s%> "Thus says <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> <S%H559><s%> 'Tell the <S%H376>man<s%> who sent you to <S%H7971>me,<s%>

"Thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> <S%H935><s%> 'Behold, I will bring <S%H7451>evil<s%> on this <S%H4725>place,<s%> and on its <S%H3427>inhabitants,<s%> even all the <S%H423>curses<s%> that are <S%H3789>written<s%> in the <S%H5612>book<s%> which they have <S%H7121>read<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah.<s%>

Because they have <S%H5800>forsaken<s%> <S%H6999>me,<s%> and have burned incense to <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods,<s%> that they might provoke me to <S%H3707>anger<s%> with all the <S%H4639>works<s%> of their <S%H3027>hands;<s%> therefore is my <S%H2534>wrath<s%> poured <S%H5413>out<s%> on this <S%H4725>place,<s%> and it shall not be <S%H3518>quenched.<s%>'"'

But <S%H413>to<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> who <S%H7971>sent<s%> you to <S%H1875>inquire<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> thus you shall <S%H559>tell<s%> <S%H559>him,<s%> 'Thus says <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> "As touching the <S%H1697>words<s%> which you have <S%H8085>heard,<s%>

because your <S%H3824>heart<s%> was <S%H7401>tender,<s%> and you <S%H3665>humbled<s%> yourself <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H430>God,<s%> when you <S%H8085>heard<s%> his <S%H1697>words<s%> against this <S%H4725>place,<s%> and against its <S%H3427>inhabitants,<s%> and have <S%H3665>humbled<s%> yourself <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H7167>me,<s%> and have torn your <S%H899>clothes,<s%> and <S%H1058>wept<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H8085>me;<s%> I also have heard <S%H5002>you,<s%>" says <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

<S%H622>"Behold,<s%> I will gather you to your <S%H1>fathers,<s%> and you shall be <S%H622>gathered<s%> to your <S%H6913>grave<s%> in <S%H7965>peace,<s%> neither shall your <S%H5869>eyes<s%> <S%H7200>see<s%> all the <S%H7451>evil<s%> that I will <S%H935>bring<s%> on this <S%H4725>place,<s%> and on its <S%H3427>inhabitants.<s%>"'" They <S%H7725>brought<s%> <S%H7725>back<s%> <S%H1697>word<s%> to the <S%H4428>king.<s%>
Then the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> and gathered <S%H622>together<s%> all the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>

The <S%H4428>king<s%> went <S%H5927>up<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and all the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> and the <S%H3548>priests,<s%> and the <S%H3881>Levites,<s%> and all the <S%H5971>people,<s%> both <S%H1419>great<s%> and <S%H6996>small:<s%> and he <S%H7121>read<s%> in their <S%H241>ears<s%> all the <S%H1697>words<s%> of the <S%H5612>book<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> that was <S%H4672>found<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

The <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H5975>stood<s%> in his <S%H5977>place,<s%> and <S%H3772>made<s%> a <S%H1285>covenant<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> to <S%H3212>walk<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and to <S%H8104>keep<s%> his <S%H4687>commandments,<s%> and his <S%H5715>testimonies,<s%> and his <S%H2706>statutes,<s%> with all his <S%H3824>heart,<s%> and with all his <S%H5315>soul,<s%> to <S%H6213>perform<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> that were <S%H3789>written<s%> in this <S%H5612>book.<s%>

He caused all who were <S%H4672>found<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> and <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%> to <S%H5975>stand.<s%> The <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> according to the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers.<s%>

<S%H2977>Josiah<s%> took <S%H5493>away<s%> all the <S%H8441>abominations<s%> out of all the <S%H776>countries<s%> that pertained to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and made all who were <S%H4672>found<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel<s%> to <S%H5647>serve,<s%> even to <S%H5647>serve<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> their <S%H430>God.<s%> All his <S%H3117>days<s%> they <S%H5493>didn't<s%> depart from <S%H310>following<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers.<s%>
